summary: ABS LIGHT AND REGEN BRAKES DISABLED LIGHT HAVE BEEN COMING ON WHILE DRIVING. WHILE THESE LIGHTS ARE ON, BRAKES ARE SQUISHY AND IS HARDER TO STOP CAR. THIS IS HAPPENING MORE FREQUENTLY AND AT VARYING SPEEDS. LIGHTS MAY COME ON WHEN THE CAR IS FIRST STARTED OR WHILE DRIVING AT VARYING SPEEDS.
